verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I see a brother standing like a mountain,
When I see a sister glowing like a fire,
Something inside me like a bubbling fountain
Quickens my faith,
Makes me want to take just another step higher.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
When I see a brother going through a battle,
Raising his hands in a victory song,
A sister who knows what it is to be shackled
Stand and proclaim
That, in Jesus' name, she's free once again,
